column2: Hey Jonathan, what troubleshooting steps have you tried so far? I haven't heard of an reports of issues in your area. ^TD

Hey Giada, I would love to take a further look into that. Can you please send me a DM with your home address and phone number. Also, include an image of the serial numbers on the back of the Portal unit. ^TD https:// twitter.com/messages/compo se?recipient_id=216808077 …

Hey Shannon, I don't see any reports of service interruptions in Vancouver. I would love to take a further look so you don't miss the game! Please DM me your home address and phone number. ^TD https:// twitter.com/messages/compo se?recipient_id=216808077 …
Glad we are rocking your world . Have a great night! ^TD
We're more than happy to be around to help whenever we can. We're here from 7AM to 10PM PT each day. Let us know anytime we can lend a hand ^SJ
Hey Garth, it will be back on the 23rd!! If you can't wait, it's available on demand for you now. Also, the holiday music channels are back! ^SJ
Hey, that isn't from us! ^SJ
Hey Vlad, let me investigate into that more closely. I am not aware of any area issues. Can you shoot over a DM to me with some account info please? Thank you! ^SJ
Hey Caroline, can you DM me more info like the email address and what else it is asking of you? ^SJ
An online for the area has been made: http:// bit.ly/2zUOmAp ^SJ
We are investigating reports from Dawson Creek. Sorry for the troubles ^SJ
We are investigating reports of troubles in FSJ. We apologize for any inconvenience it might be causing ^SJ
Afternoon Charlie, sorry to hear that you're having trouble. I am not aware of any issues there but am more than happy to investigate further. Can you send me a DM w/acc info please? ^SJ
Yes, take your hardware with you for hookup. You can organize your move at https://www. shaw.ca/moving/ . ^Phil
A second modem would mean a second internet account/subscription. Is this what you meant? Can you send me a DM so I can better help and consult? :) ^SJ

Hi Leslie! It won't be another router that you would be looking at but more so of a wifi range extender which you should find a decent deal on during Black Friday. Can you send me a DM with your account number? I'd like to run a few checks over your modem for you ^SJ
No problem! Enjoy! :) ^SJ
Good news is that it's only 2 days away but if you can't wait, you can find it on demand. Holiday music is now back too!
Glad to hear that Tommy! Let me know anytime we can be of help ^SJ
Good morning Kinney, sorry to hear that. Is there something we can help look into for you? ^SJ
Good morning Chris. Are you still having troubles this AM ? ^SJ
Good morning, sorry to hear that. Are you still having troubles this AM ? ^SJ
Good morning, sorry to hear that. Are you still having troubles this AM? ^SJ
Good morning Raveena, I'm very sorry to hear that you were having trouble last night. Are you still having troubles this AM? ^SJ
Good morning, sorry to hear that. Are you still having troubles this AM with it? ^SJ
Good morning Jeevan, sorry to hear that. Are you still having troubles this AM? ^SJ
Oooh, not cool at all :( If no go tomorrow, please let us know right away, as we would want to investigate this quirk. Cheers! ^Ken
Awesome to hear! If it gives you grief anytime, please let us know! ^Ken
Evening! Definitely some odd issues with your cable; if you have more than 1 cable box, just the 1 affected or are others having issues too? ^Ken
If you like, can see if there's anything sooner than 10 days out. DM us that account number if you want me to check. ^Ken
You're welcome, please let us know how we can help anytime! ^Ken
Are you able to access the internet, via a wired (Ethernet) connection as a test? ^Ken
That is normal light sequence; please refer to http:// bit.ly/1NO50zG ^Ken
Evening! Should be no issues in swapping out your remote; if you can DM us your acct info, can check for nearest Retail location to you. Cheers! ^Ken
Sorry to hear about the frustrations experienced Trevor. If you ever need a hand with your account, please DM us your account number and we'll have a look. Thanks! ^Ken

That error message is signal-related, or if there were any internet issues in the area; would love to take a closer look for you if you like. Feel free to message us your account info privately for a check. Thanks! ^Ken
Ouch, sorry to see that! To confirm, other boxes in home on BlueSky are working ok, except this specific one? When did the issue first started popping up? ^Ken

Hello Jeffrey, that doesn't look right! Is this with both wired and wireless connections? If you can follow and DM us your account info, we can look into this for you and get you up to where you should be! ^LD
Earlier AMC had something similar, so possibly related. That should be resolved, however if it happens again, let us know! ^LD
Hello Bob. I haven't heard of any issues tonight. Are you having trouble viewing the station? If so, what sort of trouble are you seeing? ^LD
Just in the nick of time :) If it gives you grief again, please let us know anytime. Cheers! ^Ken

Hey Krishna, sorry to hear about those calls received. Can certainly look into it and request for these calls to cease; if you like us to check, please feel free to DM us your account details. Thanks! ^Ken
Using your own router as well? If so, what brand is it? Any computers that are hardwired into our modem? ^Ken
That appears to be the modem for your home phone services; there should be another modem for the internet. ^Ken
Hey Sheeraj, what issues specifically? Is the modem online (first 4 lights should be solid), or any of them blinking? ^Ken
Definitely not a great experience for sure. Please let us know how it goes when Albert contacts you back; always here to help should you need it. ^Ken
Hey Kelsey, nothing area wide so far. Can you confirm if our modem's online (first 4/5 lights should be solid)? ^Ken

Hey James! We expect it to show up very soon; it'll be on The Frame channel, should be here any day now. In the mean time, it is currently available through VOD if you like. You can find it here https:// vod.shaw.ca/details/216160 /shaw_fire_log/ … . Cheers! ^Ken
If you do, let us know, we can forward the examples. ^Ken
Do you have a screenshot of this? ^Ken
You can catch all games via WHL Live, http:// bit.ly/2Ait2Wd for details. Production facilities used to produce this content has been officially closed. ^Ken
Thanks for the update Mike! However, services may be intermittent, as the ticket is still open and techs are investigating still. ^Ken
Hey Valerie, what seems to be the issue? ^Ken
Evening! Unfortunately, there is an area interruption at this time. We do have a paging tracking progress/updates, check out http:// bit.ly/2zSrRfJ for info. Thanks! ^Ken
Afternoon. Do you mean Shaw TV? If so, unfortunately it's now off the air as of August 15th, more details via http:// bit.ly/2jJfdsU ^Ken
Hmm, might be an area issue of all services affected. Can check for you; feel free to DM us your account information anytime for a look. Thanks! ^Ken
